name: CHOO-CHOO HOUR
description:
CHOO-CHOOOOO! Its peak period at Cheep Express. As the station master, you can call for 10 trains and send cheeps home. The more cheeps you transport, the higher your score! BUT do not let your platform get overcrowded! 

Press Space to call for trains. 

(If the game lags on the browser, you can download the PC executable version!)

Programming by Tan Kang Soon , Art by Lois Chng
"March of the Spoons" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
